game.name: PAYDAY 2: Tailor Pack 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Remote Play TV, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Tailor Pack 2 offers four new thematic outfits with five color variations for each one - for a total of 20 new looks.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tailor Pack 2 offers four new thematic outfits with five color variations for each one - for a total of 20 new looks.
